title: Akro-Mils 10144 44-Drawer Plastic Drawer Storage Cabinet for Garage Organization, Bead Organizer, Lego Storage, Teacher Toolbox, Makeup Organizer, and More, 20-Inch W x 6-Inch D x 16-Inch H, Red
description: The Akro-Mils 10144 44-Drawer Plastic Storage Cabinet Organizer with Drawers is a great solution for all your storage needs. This heavy-duty cabinet is made in the U.S.A. from rugged, high-impact polystyrene plastic and features 44 large and small plastic drawers offering ample storage space for all your small parts and tools. Plastic organizer large drawers inside dimensions: 4-7/8-Inch x 4-1/4-Inch x 2-Inch; small storage drawers dimensions: 5-1/4-Inch x 1-11/16-Inch x 1-1/2-Inch. Whether you're looking to organize your garage, workshop, classroom, or home, this storage cabinet has you covered. Garage owners and businesses will love the versatility of this cabinet, with the plastic storage drawers perfect for use as a hardware organizer, screw organizer box, or for battery storage. Keep your nails and other small parts accessible with ease. Teachers can use the cabinet for classroom storage, as a teacher toolbox, art storage, craft storage box, for scrapbook supplies, and more. This plastic storage cabinet is also perfect for home storage and organization. Use it as a lego organizer, craft organizer, hobby organizer, or bead storage organizer. It's even great for makeup storage and organization or for medicine and first aid supplies. And with the ability to stack cabinets securely or wall-mount them using keyhole slots, along with finger-grip drawer pulls and rear stop tabs to prevent contents from spilling, this cabinet has everything you need to keep your items safe and organized. Cabinets have 8 small crosswise dividers and 4 large length dividers included. Included dividers are molded into the back of the cabinet (remove with scissors). Additional dividers can be purchased separately.
